txt.en: Aboki is in Amd√¢n.\n\nYou should bring the furs to Aboki.
'These are fine furs indeed. Once we get the stench off them, they'll be made into blankets, cloaks, lining, and other items to protect our army from this biting chill.'

'Make yourself useful! Our brethren may be trying to hide shivers behind beards, but I can tell they feel the biting wind through their mail. If you can bring me fur pelts, I can make blankets and line the clothing of our brave warriors.\n\n'You will find bears, wolves, and Wargs outside these walls. The latter may or may not have pelts we can use, but you may get lucky! Anything we can do to thin their ranks is always worth it as well.'
Thick furs are needed to help to combat the bitter cold of Azanulbizar.
Bears, Wargs, and wolves can be found throughout the woods of Azanulbizar.\n\nAboki has tasked you with collecting animal pelts to help keep the army warm.
